The photo in question is a real photo ta: 2016, during a speech by President Barack Obama after Donald Trump's election.
The people in the photo were not crying: contrary to the claim made in the Facebook post.
The man pointed out in the Facebook post: The man in the photo is R. David Edelman, who has publicly denied being the whistleblower.
The actual identity of the whistleblower: and most news organizations have withheld their name.
